author: colizz
body:
#### PR description:

The concurrent GEN utilities are also be backported to 12_0_X, to benefit some samples produced by POG in the Run 3 condition. (similar to the 10_6_X backport https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34527)

It includes two PRs backported from the master branch:

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34710
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35072

#### PR validation:

No local test done. The PR should be well validated by triggering 'please test' (running on all workflows)
title: [12_0_X] Backport concurrent GEN utilities
